website_summaries.verdict: Numerous bells and whistles make this programmable coffee maker a top choice from the KitchenAid family of small appliances.
pros: Boasts a showerhead with a spiral configuration that's capable of reaching all grounds for uniform results
Programmable brew times and warming plate
Has dual brew buttons plus brew selector function for mild to bold cups
cons: Some complaints of leaks from the removable tank, which is awkward to fill

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star - Never Worked At All
customer_reviews.text: I have had Kitchen Aid Appliances including coffee makers for years, so thought ordering this new one and in a new model would be ok. Never worked, we trouble shooted all the tips. It would not turn on at all, to even let us set the time. Tested in 8 different outlets, which all our other appliances work in. It is VERY difficult to repack these items for return, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have had this about 6 weeks and I LOVE it. It has 2 separate automatic start times, you can adjust the plate timer or heater, everything is easily customizable to individual preferences. It makes both preground and fresh ground coffee, I barely spill when I pour out of the full pot (which I normally have problems spilling all over). It tells you when it needs cleaned, it’s easy clean. I honestly don’t have a negative thing to say at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Klepperich

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to try it out. Box was damaged. Coffee maker was used. Water spots on it, coffee grounds in the basket. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: keith kline

customer_reviews.title: A very good and easy to use coffeemaker from KitchenAid.
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked KitchenAid products, and this coffeemaker is simple to use and produces quality coffee at home or in the office.
customer_reviews.author: L Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is that this is a big unit! I wish KitchenAid made this exact coffee maker in an 8 cup. We are a household of 2 so 12 cups is way to much! It makes a super good, hot clear cup of coffee. I like the function of choosing bold as we do like our coffee strong. If you enjoy a quality cup of coffee this is the machine for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Prince

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item but easy to Replace
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first one but 2nd one no problem still works Great it was just embarrassing since it was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: VRENI

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the coffee maker about a month and so far I really like it! Makes great coffee, easy to use (fill up water reservoir, coffee etc), and seems solid and well made. Did quite a bit of research before buying this one and glad I made this choice!
customer_reviews.author: Dorie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Water container leaked all over counter and into drawers several times.
customer_reviews.text: Do not set up in advance for morning. Full water container occasionally leaking all over counter top. Otherwise, really nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Color does not quite match other KitchenAid products
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Makes a great pot of coffee. The grey color though does not quite match my other KitchenAid products in the same color.
customer_reviews.author: sean farrow

customer_reviews.title: Great coffeemaker with one major deficiency.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be an outstanding coffeemaker with one major deficiency. If the coffeemaker turns off at the end of it's timed cycle or is turned off (or briefly unplugged to move it) it cannot be turned back on. The only way to turn it back on is to refill the reservoir with water and start over. We occasionally want to heat up a partially filled carafe of coffee or turn is back on after briefly leaving the house and such is not possible.
customer_reviews.author: KathyE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: This fits neatly on the counter and makes great coffee. Very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Morgen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and I like how it shows you the countdown for the hot Plate.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaBear

customer_reviews.title: Makes good coffee
customer_reviews.text: The thing I don't like is that the warmer function can't be restarted--sometimes I don't get the coffee drunk in the 1-4 hour window (variable setting). All other coffee makers I've had allowed user to restart the warmer. The warmer only starts when brewing a fresh pot. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Butler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coffee maker. We had previously been using a Mr. Coffee coffee maker for years and after the pot broke we upgraded to this. The water tank is great, much less spilling on the counter. I like the pour from the pot. It is a cone shaped filter so we will need to get a different type of filter from the standard but overall it is a really great quality item.
customer_reviews.author: MoRo

customer_reviews.title: Great taste & Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this new KitchenAid Coffee Brewer to replace my 10 year old KitchenAid Coffee Brewer. They're little expensive but they brew good coffee and last forever. I like this model because you can operator it from the side so it can be pushed up against the back splash which leaves more counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great cup of coffee. It is a bit slow but it's probably because I use the bold setting which takes longer on any coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Sandy

customer_reviews.title: No more drips from pouring coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about others, but I never seem to find a coffee maker with a pot that pours without dripping. Well, meet your solution! KitchenAid has nailed this one. I wish the warmer would stay on for more than 4 hours, but just hit the brew button and it resets it. The coffee tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Clay Long

customer_reviews.title: Really great traditional coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I'm sorry the picture is sideways! It's not sideways when I open it on my computer. Oh well. This KitchenAid coffeemaker looks GREAT on my kitchen countertop. It's modern, though the way it functions is classic. It makes good coffee and has nice features: -Timer -It will pause the brewing while you pour. Always love this feature. -Permanent filter, hooray for not buying filters! -Measurements in the filter to help you know how much coffee to use. Seriously love that. All in all, a beautiful, solid, well-made coffeemaker with real metal on it (not just a bunch of plastic that looks like metal).
customer_reviews.author: C. Beth

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee!!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee machine is the first coffee machine I’ve owned in years. I’ve primarily been using a Hario for great tasting pour-over but it’s been very time consuming to make. When I got this machine I was excited I could easily make a lot of coffee at once but I was skeptical that the coffee would taste any good compared to my usual pour-over. Surprisingly, the coffee tasted very good. Not as good as my pour-over but still very good and enough that I don’t feel the need to make any more pour-overs most of the time. I really love this coffee maker and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bottom Line Up Front

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Hot coffee first thing in the morning is the only thing that gets me going so when our old coffeemaker starting being ... um... difficult, we decided this was going to be the next one to try. ANd boy does it make fabulous coffee! Plus the hot plate can keep it super hot for hours, which is fantastic because I drink several cups throughout the morning and I like it to be just as hot as it was the second it finished brewing. This is an amazing coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: This replaced several previous coffee makers. And it’s here to stay. I have had several k cup brewers and individual cup brewers. This one makes a better cup. The water reservoir does not retain water. So however much water you put in, is how much coffee it will brew. Initially I thought this would be a downside but it’s not. The quality of the brew makes up for any lack of convenience. Good product from a good company.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Automatic everything
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker does it all. Different brew styles, has a built in cleaning cycle, Two different preset brew timers. I am surprised it does not drive to the supermarket for more coffee when we run out. The filter is an included mesh filter and it can also be used with the paper cone filters. The filter and the part it sits in come out for cleaning as well. It has brew buttons on the front and on the side, so you can shove it under the cabinets as well to save space.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded my 4 cup, this is nice
customer_reviews.text: This is nice coffee maker. Its got 12 cup capacity. It has a clock so you can set up 2! auto start times. has a reusable filter for grounds, and a stepped maker inside to measure the grounds. you can set the 'warmer' mode length too. Only issue is that the way its set up, it can be hard to use. The water is at the back, along with the plug, the clock on on the left hand side, and the carafe is up front. so placement on the counter is a little awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Slvrscoobie

customer_reviews.title: A 12 cup coffee maker by the outstanding Kitchen-aid people!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent coffee maker and one that is unusual in that you can make 12 cups rather than 10 which most companies feature. The system is very easy to prepare and also when finished easy to clean up. This is a great product and one that will be necessary when you are having a large gathering after the virus leaves our shores.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Glad I switched
customer_reviews.text: I really like the coffee maker. I recently switched from a keurig and this coffee maker was perfect. The basket is easy to remove and clean. No need for disposable filters. Water tank can be completely removed to fill and deep clean. I really like the look of it too. Very simple yet stylish. Doesn’t take up a ton of room on my countertop.
customer_reviews.author: PartyofFive

customer_reviews.title: Decent, probably better options
customer_reviews.text: Not convenient to fill the water, leaks some, quality so so...I'd pass...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional coffee maker. Best I have ever owned. Coffee tastes great and the variable time and temp control on the coffee hot plate is quite the bonus, along with the "Bold or Regular" brew buttons. The molded/affixed plastic at the top of the carafe makes it absolutely "No-Spill" when pouring. Just difficult to clean carafe unless you put it into the dishwasher and of Course remove the top lid, which we occasionally do. Unfortunately, no replaceable water filter, like my previous KitchenAide coffee maker, but that is OK; since my refrigerator water filter works fine for filtered coffee water.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working before we could brew a single pot of coffee
customer_reviews.text: We were anxious for our new Kitchenaid coffee maker to arrive after our last one broke after 8 years of daily use. We like the removable reservoir for the water because it's so easy to fill, and there aren't many coffee makers on the market where the reservoir is removable. After unpacking it and running two pots of water through the coffee maker yesterday, we went to make a pot this morning and it was dead. I'm now looking for recommendations and other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Have had this coffee maker for a couple weeks now and no issues so far. I will keep you updated as I go but makes coffee great and the Kitchen Aid brand is top notch from my mixer and other kitchen utensils.
customer_reviews.author: S.E. ENT.

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid KCM1209DG Drip Coffee Maker, 12 Cup, Matte Grey
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for cooking! It works as described and is very durable. Cleaning is also very simple. Definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Fully Featured Coffeemaker With Detachable Water Tank For Easier Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: After descaling this coffee maker before using, this coffee maker comes with the usual nice features: a clock timer, a warmer (that can be used for four hours), auto-shutoff, and you can program the plate for different heat. You can actually remove the water tank in this one for separate cleaning. The water spread is much more even than my previous coffee maker. As I have other grey KitchenAid equipment in the kitchen, this fits thematically with the bread maker and mixer that I already have. If this coffee maker lasts, this fulfills every function and allows me to not have to deal with descaling more often as I can clean the water tank directly.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KCM1209OB Drip Coffee Maker, 12 Cup, Onyx Black
product_meta.description: Color:Onyx BlackBrew delicious drip Coffee, every time. This 12 Cup drip Coffee maker, with spiral showerhead and programmable warming plate, allows you to brew delicious Coffee, every time. It evenly saturates Coffee grounds for optimal extraction, producing an exceptionally flavourful cup of Coffee. Also, this Coffee maker also features a variable brew strength Selector to choose between regular and bold strengths, 24 hour programmability, so your Coffee can be ready at any time, day or night, and a pause and pour feature to pour a cup of Coffee before the brewing is complete.
feature_bullets: Unique 29-hole spiral showerhead evenly saturates coffee grounds for optimal extraction
Dosage ladder on the gold tone filter and dosage chart on the water tank
Clear, easy to fill removable water tank with large opening to minimize spills
Programmable Warming Plate to keep your coffee at the perfect temperature (High or Low) up to 4 hours
2 brew buttons (side, front) to place the brewer anyway you like on the countertop
Unique spout design on the glass carafe helps prevent drips and messes
Included Components: Coffee Maker Glass Carafe Removable Water Tank Gold Tone Filter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars85 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
